templates.title: Mariadb
templates.name: Mariadb
templates.note:
Portainer App Templates by Foxly.de based on data provided by LinuxServer.io.

Don't forget to create the volume directories on the host file system.

mkdir -p /volume1/docker/mariadb/config
templates.description: [Mariadb](https://mariadb.org/) is one of the most popular database servers. Made by the original developers of MySQL.

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.description: Set this to root password for installation (minimum 4 characters).

env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Specify a timezone to use for example Europe/Berlin

env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE
env.label: MYSQL_DATABASE
env.description: Specify the name of a database to be created on image startup.

env.name: MYSQL_USER
env.label: MYSQL_USER
env.description: This user will have superuser access to the database specified by MYSQL_DATABASE (do not use root here).

env.name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
env.label: MYSQL_PASSWORD
env.description: Set this to the password you want to use for you MYSQL_USER (minimum 4 characters).

env.name: REMOTE_SQL
env.label: REMOTE_SQL
env.description: Set this to ingest sql files from an http/https endpoint (comma seperated array).
